title: Dominican Republic Plane Crash Kills Nine
sub_head: Puerto Rican music producer José Ángel Hernández, known as ‘Flow La Movie,’ is among the dead
body:
SANTO DOMINGO, Dominican Republic—A small plane attempting to land minutes after beginning a flight to Florida crashed in the Dominican Republic on Wednesday, killing all nine people aboard, including Puerto Rican music producer José Ángel Hernández, the aircraft’s operating company reported.
Helidosa Aviation Group said on its Twitter account that the Gulfstream jet was carrying two crew members and seven passengers.
